text: Archer is an American adult animated black comedy, action adventure television series. It is about a secret agent whose boss is his mother. The series airs on FX. A preview for the series aired on September 17, 2009. The first season started on January 14, 2010. Aisha Tyler plays Lana. Jessica Walter plays Malory Archer. This television series has a rating of TV-MA, usually for foul language and violence. Sometimes there is also nudity. ==References== Category:2009 American television series debuts Category:2000s American sitcoms Category:2010s American sitcoms Category:Adult animated television series Category:Spy television series Category:Fox television series Category:Black comedy television series Category:English-language television programs
title: Archer (TV series)
